transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello haanji sir.
Executive: Ji mam kaun baat kar rahe ho aap?
Customer: Sir IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu bataiye.
Executive: IndiaMART se to baat kar rahe ho naam bataiye.
Customer: Sir nidhi baat kar rahi hu.
Executive: Ji aap hi karte attend call pura.
Executive: Sir aap bataiye aap kis company se baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Hello





Executive: We value your call. Your continued patience is greatly appreciated. Please stay on the line.





Executive: Thank you very much for calling. Please continue to hold and we will be with you shortly.





Executive: We are working rapidly to ensure your hold time with us will be as brief as possible. Your patience is appreciated.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive asked the customer which company they are calling from.



Resolution:

- The call was put on hold.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- introduction, company details, hold
